example.eg: The scientist attempted to prove his theory.
example.egtrans: 这位科学家试图证明自己的理论。

example.eg: The detective's hunch proved to be right.
example.egtrans: 侦探的预感被证明是对的。

example.eg: Allow the dough to prove for two hours before shaping it into a loaf.
example.egtrans: 在将面团做成条状面包的形状前先要让它发酵两小时。

example.eg: You will need to prove the dough before baking it.
example.egtrans: 在烘焙前要先等面团发酵。

example.eg: To prove the theorem, you must show your work.
The will was proved by his widow.
With his older siblings being high achievers, James feels he has to prove himself.
Harry claimed that he was good at cooking and to prove the point, he would prepare a meal for us.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 证实论点, 证明观点

dsense.name: prove true
dsense.guideword: (be borne out, be shown to be accurate)

example.eg: If these allegations prove true, the governor will be in big trouble.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 证明为真实, 证明为准确

example.eg: My father said I would never be an athlete; I'm determined to prove him wrong.

dsense.name: prove your point, prove a point

example.eg: Rod gave a very convincing demonstration that proved his point.
